data.title: Victoria L. Vetter, MD, FAAP, FACC
data.meta_description: Victoria L. Vetter, MD, is a board-certified cardiologist in the Cardiac Center at Children's Hospital of Philadelphia and Medical Director of Youth Heart Watch. She is also an academic investigator for the Healthy Weight Program.
